article.title: Navistar Receives Modification for Sustainment Items to Support Mine-Resistant Ambush-Protected Low-Rate Vehicles
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Navistar Defense LLC has received a $54 million firm-fixed-priced modification under a previously awarded contract for sustainment items needed to support Category I Mine Resistant Ambush Protected Low Rate Initial Production vehicles in theater. This order also will be used to support the renewal of field service representative support within the U.S. Central Command area of responsibility.
